channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Top 100 Spas Of 2024 Reveal New Wellness Trends In Travel
item.description: Oxygen facials, CBD massages, cryotherapy, and IV infusions are among the most popular wellness offerings of America's top spas and resorts.

item.title: Did DeepSeek Copy Off Of OpenAI? And What Is Distillation?
item.description: Description: The global AI world is aghast at news about how Chinese company DeepSeek set up its new models.

item.title: Ozempic-Like Drugs May Hold Risks For Surgical Patients, Officials Say
item.description: Surgical patients may still have leftovers in their system even after a standard fast, potentially increasing the chance of a serious complication.
